¹ The next seventeen lines to the 1001 01 1116 column are illegible.
2 This column 15 very indistinet and, in many cases, conjectural readings,
based upon the L. T., are given.

³ Ms. tene 4 Ms. eommor ⁵ Ms. tene-d
⁶ Ut.. . . terra has been taken over from the L. T. 65 part 01 1116
quotation.

⁷ Ms. talman
